Quarterly Results

Figure 1

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
dt = rnorm(100,0,1)
dt2 = (1:100)

dtt <- data.frame(cbind(x=dt,y=dt2))

ggplotly(ggplot(dtt,aes(x,y)) + geom_point())

Figure 2

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
dt = rnorm(100,0,1)
dt2 = (1:100)

dtt <- data.frame(cbind(x=dt,y=dt2))

ggplotly(ggplot(dtt,aes(x,y)) + geom_line())

Figure 3

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
dt = rnorm(100,0,1)
dt2 = (1:100)

dtt <- data.frame(cbind(x=dt,y=dt2))

ggplotly(ggplot(dtt,aes(x,y)) + geom_line())
knitr::include_url("./pop_plotly.html", height = "500 px")
